select
distinct
from TBL_SKU
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_SKU (SKU_NO, SKU_NAME, BARCODE, SKU_TYPE, SUB_DEPT_ID, CLASS_ID, SUB_CLASS_ID, SO_FLAG, VENDOR_ID, SKU_STATUS, TAX_TYPE, PACKS, DANGER_FLAG, OPEN_PRICE, FREE_DELIVER, STD_PACK, INNER_PACK, SKU_UNIT, HEIGHT, WIDTH, DEEPTH, DIMENSION, WEIGHT, MAUND, MODIFY_TIME, DC_TYPE, SKU_CAT, HISU_MC, SKU_MC, BRAND, STYLE_NO, BARREL_TYPE, HANDLE_TYPE, HANDLE_SIZE_CODE, COMBINED_CODE, QUO_VALID_DATE, QUO_INVALID_DATE, PHOTO, SPL_MODIFIER, SPL_MODIFY_TIME, SO_REASON) values (#{skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subClassId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dangerFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeDeliver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdPack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{innerPack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{skuUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{width,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deepth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{maund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hisuMc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuMc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{styleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barrelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleSizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{combinedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quoValidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{quoInvalidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{soReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TBL_SKU
SKU_NO = #{row.skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_NAME = #{row.skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BARCODE = #{row.barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_TYPE = #{row.skuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_DEPT_ID = #{row.subDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SO_REASON = #{row.soReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
